body.name: Soft Silicone Baby Feeding Bottles | Anti-Colic, Slow-Flow Nipples, Balanced Base, Natural Shape for Natural Latching and Holding, Easy to Clean, 2-Pack (6 oz, Green)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 21 hrs 18 mins
features: ANTI-COLIC COMFORT: Our Soft Silicone Baby Feeding Bottles are expertly designed to ensure a comfortable feeding experience for your little one. The anti-colic feature helps reduce gas and fussiness during and after feeding sessions, so your baby can enjoy their meals with ease.

SAFETY FIRST: Our Soft Silicone Baby Feeding Bottles are crafted from 100% food-grade silicone, ensuring the highest level of safety for your baby. They are also completely BPA-free, PVC-free, phthalates-free and nitrosamine-free, giving you extra peace of mind that your child is being nourished with pure, toxin-free materials. Your baby's health and well-being are our top priorities

MIMICKING NATURE: The natural shape of these bottles closely mimics breastfeeding, promoting a seamless transition between breast and bottle. Babies find it easy to latch onto the soft, silicone nipple, making it convenient for both baby and parent.

SOFT STABLE BOTTLES: The balanced base of these bottles offers enhanced stability, making it simple to set them down without worry. No more accidental spills or tipping, allowing for a more relaxed feeding process.

EFFORTLESS MAINTENANCE: Cleaning these bottles is a breeze. Their straightforward design, wide neck and high-quality materials mean less time spent on chores and more time enjoying precious moments with your baby.
body.description: This 2-pack, with a capacity of 6 oz each, comes in a calming green shade and with slow-flow nipples. Designed with a balanced base for stability, these bottles mimic a soft and natural shape, making latching and holding effortless for both baby and parent. Crafted with anti-colic properties, they help reduce discomfort during feeding. Cleaning is a breeze with their easy-to-maintain design. But why silicone, instead of plastic? Our choice ensures safety (no harmful chemicals leaching into your baby's food), easy cleaning (no retention of stains/odors), and an eco-friendly approach (more durable and easier to grip by both babies and adults) for worry-free feeding experiences. Experience quality, comfort, and convenience with every feed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My son loves them
reviews.reviewText: Love these bottles I’m just waiting to they have more of the 9 ounce to purchase more. My son has a hard time latching on the bottles and these bottles are perfect for him . Does not cause any gassy or upset stomach. Best bottle hands down.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My breastfeed baby likes them
reviews.reviewText: My one year old is a little picky about bottles. During the day she’ll use any bottle or cup without a problem but at nap time she only wants to nurse. The silicone Comotomo is the only bottle she will substitute for breast but they are a little pricey. Thankfully this one is identical and much cheaper plus the Comotomo nipples fit too so that’s a plus

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Lovely baby bottles
reviews.reviewText: I am in love with these bottles 😍 they are eye catching, only concern is the silicone. Keep thinking "are these baby friendly" 🤔

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is the only bottle my little one will drink from. We tried at least 5 other baby bottle maker and my little one absolutely refused to drink from them. That was until we found this bottle. This bottle has been a life saver.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My son loves these bottles! ❤️❤️❤️
reviews.reviewText: My son is very picky with nipples and bottles. These bottles are now the only bottles he will drink from. They are not only less expensive than other name brands, but are more preferred (by my infant ~ 3 Months Old) than the leading silicone brands like Nanobebe, Tiny Twinkle and Tommy Tippee. We have all of these brands and these are his absolute favorite by far! ❤️
